Summary: I saw right above the horizon where the mountain range is bright red lights first one red light then alot of them 5 or 6 they just blinked on then off to one red light
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Mossyrock
There were no other sightings in Mossyrock on or around February 14th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI went to feed my hourse its was about 7:10pm tuesday the 14 2012.I went down the hill fed my horse stayed a few mintues with horse then walked and I looked over to the horizon I saw a red blinking lite then 5 or 6 just winked on then there was just one I kept looking to see if there was a tower or something to cause that.I kept stairing then I got scared and ran up the hill to the house. last summer think it was july 2011 about 1am I was laying down on the couch when I saw a large expolsion of white light it was so bright it lite the whole area outside
